message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
Let's split it evenly, Alice. It's the fairest way to start.
You said it was fair to split it evenly, but I think I'm worth more than you, Bob!
I'm willing to compromise, Alice. Let's split it 40/60, acknowledging your perceived value.
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'm not budging!
Alice, we're running out of time. Let's be reasonable and split it 35/65. This is my final offer.
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, Bob. The value is plummeting!
